name: langchainjs-quickstart-demo
description: Generative AI demo using Azure Functions and LangChain.js

scripts.start:local: node --input-type=module -e "import ask from './src/local.js'; for await(let c of ask());"
scripts.start:azure: node --input-type=module -e "import ask from './src/azure.js'; for await(let c of ask());"
